program_phase_options.description: Introductory phase focused on technique, joint health, and preparing the body for training stress.
Focus on increasing total work capacity. Ideal for muscle growth (Hypertrophy) or endurance goals.
Focus on lifting heavier loads or increasing difficulty. Ideal for building Strength.
Moderate volume and intensity to preserve fitness gains during busy periods or holidays.
A short period to re-test Personal Bests or body composition metrics.
Reduced training load to allow for full systemic recovery.
